AT.name: Megaman Battle Network
AT.description: In der Zukunft kämpft ein Junge namens Lan mithilfe seines Personal Exploration Terminals (PET) gegen das Cyberverbrechen. Aber Lans PET enthält keine gewöhnliche künstliche Intelligenz, sondern die MegaMan.EXE, eine Cyberidentität, die dazu in der Lage ist, das von Verbrechen überflutete Netzwerk zu infiltrieren und sich zerstörerischen Computerviren im Kampf zu stellen! Zerstöre Viren in Echtzeit und sammele Battle Chips-Daten, die wertvolle Waffen und kritische Systeminformationen enthalten. Mehr als 175 Battle Chips warten darauf, von dir gesammelt zu werden. Hilf Lan und MegaMan.EXE dabei, wieder Frieden und Ordnung im Netzwerk herzustellen!

AU.name: Megaman Battle Network
AU.description: In the future, a youngster named Lan battles cyber-crime with his Personal Exploration Terminal (PET). But Lan's PET is no ordinary avatar; it's Mega Man.EXE, a cyber-identity which infiltrates the crime-ridden network to battle destructive computer viruses! Defeat viruses in real time and collect Battle Chips: data containing valuable weapons and critical system info. There are more than 175 Battle Chips to collect. Help Lan and Mega Man.EXE restore peace and order to the network!

BG.name: Megaman Battle Network
BG.description: In the future, a youngster named Lan battles cyber-crime with his Personal Exploration Terminal (PET). But Lan's PET is no ordinary avatar; it's Mega Man.EXE, a cyber-identity which infiltrates the crime-ridden network to battle destructive computer viruses! Defeat viruses in real time and collect Battle Chips: data containing valuable weapons and critical system info. There are more than 175 Battle Chips to collect. BE.name: Megaman Battle Network
BE.description: Dans un futur proche, un jeune homme prénommé Lan se bat contre la cybercriminalité à l'aide de son Terminal d'Exploration Personnel (PET). Mais le terminal de Lan n'est pas un avatar ordinaire ; il s'agit de Mega Man.EXE, une entité cybernétique qui infiltre le réseau empoisonné par le crime et combat les virus qui détruisent les ordinateurs ! Anéantissez les virus en temps réel et ramassez des Battle Chips, puces de combat qui contiennent des données importantes sur les armes et des informations cruciales sur le système. Il y a plus de 175 Battle Chips à collecter. Aidez Lan et Mega Man.EXE à restaurer la paix et l'ordre dans le réseau !

ES.name: Megaman Battle Network
ES.description: En el futuro, un joven llamado Lan combate el crimen cibernético con un artefacto conocido como PET (Terminal de exploración personal). Sin embargo, el aparato de Lan no es como el resto, sino que se trata de Mega Man.EXE, una identidad cibernética capaz de infiltrarse en la red infestada por el crimen para luchar contra los virus informáticos destructivos. Elimina los virus a tiempo real y colecciona Battle Chips, datos que contienen información vital sobre el sistema y sobre un poderoso armamento. ¡Hay más de 175 chips esperando a que los recojas! Ayuda a Lan y a Mega Man.EXE a restaurar la paz y el orden en la red.

IT.name: Megaman Battle Network
IT.description: In un futuro prossimo, un giovane chiamato Lan combatte il crimine informatico con il suo PET (Terminale esplorativo personale). Ma il PET non è un comune avatar: è Mega Man.EXE, un'identità informatica che si infiltra nella rete attaccata dal crimine per eliminare pericolosissimi virus informatici! Lotta contro i virus in tempo reale e raccogli i Battle Chip, dati che contengono armi preziose e importanti informazioni di sistema. Ci sono più di 175 Battle Chip da raccogliere. Aiuta Lan e Mega Man.EXE a riportare la pace e l'ordine nella rete!

NL.name: Megaman Battle Network
NL.description: We schrijven de toekomst, en de jonge held Lan gaat met zijn Personal Exploration Terminal (PET) de strijd aan tegen de misdaad. Maar Lans PET is geen gewone avatar; het is Mega Man.EXE, een cyber-identiteit die het door misdaad vergeven netwerk infiltreert om verwoestende computervirussen tegen te gaan! Versla virussen in realtime en vergaar Battle Chips: data die waardevolle wapens en kritische systeeminformatie bevatten. Je kunt in totaal meer dan 175 Battle Chips verzamelen. Help Lan en Mega Man.EXE bij het terugbrengen van rust en orde op het netwerk!

NZ.name: Megaman Battle Network
NZ.description: In the future, a youngster named Lan battles cyber-crime with his Personal Exploration Terminal (PET). But Lan's PET is no ordinary avatar; it's Mega Man.EXE, a cyber-identity which infiltrates the crime-ridden network to battle destructive computer viruses! Defeat viruses in real time and collect Battle Chips: data containing valuable weapons and critical system info. There are more than 175 Battle Chips to collect. PL.name: Megaman Battle Network
PL.description: In the future, a youngster named Lan battles cyber-crime with his Personal Exploration Terminal (PET). But Lan's PET is no ordinary avatar; it's Mega Man.EXE, a cyber-identity which infiltrates the crime-ridden network to battle destructive computer viruses! PT.name: Megaman Battle Network
PT.description: No futuro, um jovem chamado Lan combate o cibercrime com um equipamento conhecido por PET (Terminal de Exploração Pessoal). No entanto, o PET de Lan não é um comum avatar, mas sim Mega Man.EXE, uma identidade cibernética capaz de se infiltrar na rede infestada de crime, para combater os vírus informáticos destrutivos! Elimina os vírus em tempo real e recolhe Battle Chips, dados que contêm poderosas armas e informação vital sobre o sistema. Existem mais de 175 Battle Chips à tua espera! Ajuda Lan e Mega Man.EXE a restabelecer a paz e a ordem na rede!

RU.name: Megaman Battle Network
RU.description: В далеком будущем юный смельчак по имени Lan, вооружившись небольшим компьютером под названием PET (Personal Exploration Terminal), объявил войну киберпреступности. Как известно, один в поле не воин: у нашего героя есть киберсоюзник — Mega Man.EXE, который внедрился в преступную сеть и борется с опасными компьютерными вирусами! Уничтожайте вирусы в реальном времени и собирайте боевые жетоны, чтобы получить оружие и критически важные сведения о системе. Всего вам предстоит собрать 175 жетонов. Помогите Lan и Mega Man.EXE восстановить мир и правопорядок в сети!
